author: JoseZ

review: This is my third Apple TV.  Love it!  An excellent use of ~$100 if you have a solid iTunes library...and a dedicated "always on" computer/drive running your iTunes library 24x7 that you can tap into.I was surprised, however, to find out that a USED Apple TV was shipped to me...and part of the packaging that would hold a new Apple TV perfectly in place was gone -- the plastic wrap around the outside of the box, the protective plastic around the Apple TV and remotes were part of the mess, but haphazardly replaced, and the cardboard "guides" inside the box that keep eveything in place weren't there.  When I opened the box the remote control was "floating around" freely in the larger box's packaging...it had completely slipped out of the Apple TV box.  Scuffed up.  VERY unlike Amazon!  PLEASE DON'T LET YOUR AWESOME QUALITY CONTROL SLIP AMAZON!!!  I have been a happy customer for years and want to remain so.Also I think this was the FIRST time that my shipment has been late.  Usually UPS and on time or early.  This was FedEx and a day late!?!?!
